origin.thermorigins.steampowered.name: Steampowered
origin.thermorigins.steampowered.descrip:
These powerful living machines are a legacy from the age of steam.
How they were built?
Who built them?
Where did their creator gone?
No one can answer, this Steampunk story remains a mystery.
power.thermorigins.steampowered/steam_en:
You're powered by a furnace-based steam engine in your body.
The working furnace will turn water into steam, and thus pushing your pistons to work.
If you ran out of water, you'll get overheated and start burning.
power.thermorigins.steampowered/non_meta: Your physical structure isn't supporting normal metabolism, so you don't need any food or air, and is immune to saturation, hunger, nausea, poison effects.
power.thermorigins.steampowered/steam_po:
You're completely power driven, which means your power will slowly gets consumed through most of vanilla food-consuming actions.
When your power died out, your movement will be highly restricted.
power.thermorigins.steampowered/metallic:
Your metallic structure grants you natural armor and knockback resistance.
However, due to metal's density, you move slower and may not swim or use elytra.
Actually, you're even immune to slow fall and levitation.
Of Course, metal can conduct electric charge, so you are highly vulnerable to lightning bolts and is likely to be targeted.
power.thermorigins.steampowered/mechanic:
Your arms are powerful tools designed for excavation and combat.
The more power you have, the more powerful your arms may be.
With enough power supply, you can harvest most of the blocks fast with bare hands and deal more damage to enemies.
